alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:18AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Williamson, northern Travis and central Burnet Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 217 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jarrell to Liberty Hill to Smithwick. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Round Rock, Cedar Park, Georgetown, Pflugerville, Taylor, Burnet, Marble Falls, Granger, Bertram, Serenada, Anderson Mill, Windemere, Leander, Hutto, Lago Vista, Hudson Bend, Bartlett, Liberty Hill and Jarrell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
